SEARCH
Package com.game.Items

Class Item

java.lang.Object
com.game.Utilities.Position
com.game.Items.Item
Direct Known Subclasses:
APlusPaper, Bed, Coffee, PileOfBooks, Vortex
public class Item extends Position
Serves as the base class for all items in the game, defining common properties and methods.

This abstract class extends Position to include positional data and implements common item behaviors such as drawing the item on the screen, handling item state updates, and defining collision actions. Specific item classes extend this base class to implement item-specific behaviors and effects.
